para: The file My.sel should have the following contents:

example.title: Package selection file
example.screen:
# SuSE-Linux-Package-Selection 2.1 -- (c) 1994-2001 SuSE GmbH
Version: 2.1
Name: My
Label: My system
Conflicts: Minimal+X11 default Standard Alles Category: baseconf
Visible: true
Toinstall: aaa_base aaa_dir aaa_skel aaa_version ash at base .... yast2-ui-ncurses Llatsniot:
Toinstall.ja: jfbterm kon2 kon2font Llatsniot.ja:
